Articles.Content: In 1.1.1 I was using Firespitter and FSfuelSwitchPatch.cfg, which I thought was Stock Fuel Switch but now I'm not so sure. However, when I moved everything over to 1.1.2, it quit working. I also tried Interstellar Fuel Switch in 1.1.1 and 1.1.2 and it didn't seem to work. I feel like I must be missing something simple here. What is everyone else using for fuel switching in 1.1.2?
So I upgraded Module Manager from 2.6.23 to 2.6.24 and everything works now.
